title: bug splats
body: ive been getting bug splatted every single dady from this new beta client id liek to not get 5 20 min waits due to your buggy cleint its unfair and it needs to be fixed please.

replies.body: If you keep getting bug splats every time you try to play, there might be some corrupted game files or outdated drivers that are causing the client to mess up. Look over the steps in our [**Bug Splat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) to see if we can get to the bottom of those crashes.
